verbs.description: The special counsel [V: was] working within his authority when he charged against Trump 's former campaign chairman , a federal judge in Washington ruled . But a second judge in Virginia could rule differently .

[ARG0: The special counsel] was [V: working] [ARGM-MNR: within his authority] [ARGM-TMP: when he charged against Trump 's former campaign chairman] , a federal judge in Washington ruled . But a second judge in Virginia could rule differently .

The special counsel was working within his authority [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [V: charged] [ARG3: against Trump 's former campaign chairman] , a federal judge in Washington ruled . But a second judge in Virginia could rule differently .

The special counsel was working within his authority when he charged against Trump 's former campaign chairman , [ARG0: a federal judge in Washington] [V: ruled] . But a second judge in Virginia could rule differently .

The special counsel was working within his authority when he charged against Trump 's former campaign chairman , a federal judge in Washington ruled . But a second judge in Virginia [V: could] rule differently .

The special counsel was working within his authority when he charged against Trump 's former campaign chairman , a federal judge in Washington ruled . But [ARG0: a second judge in Virginia] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: rule] [ARGM-MNR: differently] .
